name: BioRift
description:
The colony ship Kardeshev was on a 314 year mission to New Hope but something went wrong. All systems are down and you have been neurologically connected to a robo-tech to repair the ship and ensure the safety of thousands of passengers. 

NOTE: This is really unpolished and forced to be done for my very first game jam. 
I have a list a mile long of things I know that don't work and things I fudged to finish.

Please let me know in the comments if you think the concept is solid or what you might want to see in the final game. I've decided to attempt to make a full game of this over time.
